5407.name: Drone TV
5407.description: Join Drone TV now for exclusive aerial content. Elevate your viewing experience with high-quality videography that takes you on exciting journeys around the world, inspiring exploration and adventure.

6208.name: Law & Crime
6208.description: Discover the Law & Crime Channel, your go-to source for live trial coverage, expert legal analysis, and gripping true crime stories 24/7. Tune in for the latest!

6435.name: PursuitUP
6435.description: PursuitUP is a television network dedicated to the hunting and fishing lifestyle that millions of people enjoy. With content from over 100 producers. At Pursuit we’ve got something for everyone with a passion for the outdoors. Pursuit UP, We Deliver the Outdoors.

7531.name: Real Crime Uncovered
7531.description: Real Crime Uncovered is a 24/7 true‑crime channel featuring gripping documentaries, series, and vodcasts on murders, cold cases, organized crime, forensics, and justice—delivering first‑hand accounts and investigative storytelling around the clock.

8339.name: Dark Screen
8339.description: Dark Screen is where you find the best thrillers and horrors made. No filler, no gimmicks—just genuinely well-crafted films that know how to get under your skin. We’ve picked every title because it works, because it matters, and because it’s worth your time.

8345.name: WonderViz
8345.description:
Whether you’re craving an intense action series, a soul-stirring doc, or a raw indie film that makes you think long after the credits roll — WonderViz delivers it with style, grit, and heart. From heart-pounding thrillers, gripping crime dramas, and edge-of-your-seat
suspense, to more.

6595.name: Western Bound
6595.description: Western Bound US: Your 24/7 destination for classic and modern Western storytelling. Immerse yourself in frontier adventures, iconic series, and cowboy legends across multiple streaming platforms. Free, authentic, and always entertaining.

5309.name: Electric Now
5309.description: Catch your favorite TV shows, cult classic movies, and pop culture hits all day, every day with Electric Now. From iconic series to unforgettable films, it’s your go-to channel for nonstop entertainment.

6637.name: Sooner: Coming of Age
6637.description: Coming Age showcases powerful films about growing up from emerging filmmakers. We spotlight fresh voices with bold storytelling, featuring new directors and actors shaping modern cinema. Experience unique perspectives, emotional narratives, and cutting-edge creativity as the future of storytelling u

6639.name: Sooner: Next Gen
6639.description: Explore films by emerging filmmakers who bring new talents and innovative views to the screen. Discover the directors and actors shaping the future of cinema with their unique and impactful storytelling.
programs: Der Stoff, aus dem Träume sind

8343.name: FilmNight
8343.description: Quality films, period. FilmNight is built on one idea: showcase the movies in all these genres that are genuinely good. No filler, no compromise—just the kind of cinema that reminds you why you love watching films in the first place.

6408.name: Dark Matters TV
6408.description: Dark Matter TV is your go-to channel for horror, sci-fi, action, and true crime. Packed with cult classics, hidden gems, and intense thrillers, it’s genre entertainment the way fans actually want it—bold, curated, and endlessly bingeable.

7529.name: Beyond Paranormal
7529.description: Beyond Paranormal is a 24/7 channel exploring ghosts, hauntings, UFOs, cryptids, and unexplained phenomena through chilling docu‑series, documentaries, and vodcasts that dive into the world of the supernatural.

7017.name: Unleashed by DOGTV
7017.description: Unleashed by DOGTV is the ultimate free streaming channel for dog lovers. We’ve got expert training, wellness tips, adoption stories, heartwarming rescues, fun dog-umentaries, family-friendly shows, and lifestyle content-24/7, all about pups and their people.

7061.name: Wild Nature
7061.description: 24/7 high-def streaming channel showcasing breathtaking wildlife documentaries, exotic habitats, and rare animal encounters from around the globe.

7043.name: INWILD
7043.description: INWILD, Insight Global’s nature and wildlife channel, takes viewers on an awe-inspiring journey across the planet, showcasing untamed landscapes, majestic creatures, and breathtaking natural wonders from every corner of the globe

7045.name: INWONDER
7045.description: INWONDER is Insight TV’s science and technology FAST channel, featuring thrilling experiments, A.I., futuristic innovations, space explorations, and the secrets of our planet—blurring the line between learning and entertainment

7041.name: INTROUBLE
7041.description: INTROUBLE is Insight TV’s action and sports FAST channel, featuring adrenaline-fueled content like extreme sports, motorsports, and adventure series for Millennial and Gen-Z viewers seeking excitement and real-life stories

5748.name: KIDDO+
5748.description: KIDDO+ TV Channel offers 24/7 streaming of engaging movies and series for kids, featuring animation and family-friendly content tailored for young audiences. Tune in today!

6589.name: Teenvee
6589.description:
TeenVee is two incredible shows! Teen-Z tells hilarious stories about students
as they make friends and get into plenty of awkward situations. Avocado Couple combines animation
and humour to highlight the many aspects of relationships.

6585.name: Imagine PlayWorld
6585.description:
Welcome to this extraordinary world, where arts, crafts, and fantasy meet in a
whirlwind of entertainment! This is the ultimate channel for parents, guardians, and kids alike, where
imagination and creativity knows no bounds.

8341.name: Boomi & Friends
8341.description: Bommi & Friends” is an edutainment series for children and parents, following the adventures of a girl named Bommi and her friends in each episode. Through fun and imaginative stories, it teaches values, builds confidence, and makes learning a joyful family experience.

7269.name: Wine, Watches & Whiskey
7269.description: Sip, savor, and splurge with Wine, Watches & Whiskey—a refined escape into rare vintages, timeless timepieces, and top-shelf spirits. Where luxury meets obsession, 24/7. Taste life’s finer things, only on STIRR.

6587.name: Slick Slime Sam
6587.description:
Meet Slick Slime Sam! The most entertaining slime in history and his "pet
human" Sue help with your latest DIY or life hack project, cook incredible food and work together to
find common ground. Sam is pink, hilarious and ready to get to work!

7275.name: Cuisine Culture
7275.description: Taste the world, one show at a time. Cuisine & Culture serves up global flavors, culinary adventures, and the stories behind every dish. From street food to fine dining, discover what brings us together—deliciously, every day.

7327.name: Weather Nation
7327.description: Weather Nation is a 24/7 channel providing live and recorded weather news, local and national forecasts, severe weather updates, and expert analysis from certified meteorologists—delivering accurate weather information any time you need it.

7271.name: Salem News Channel
7271.description: Salem News Channel delivers 24/7 conservative news, bold opinion, and trusted hosts like Hugh Hewitt and Charlie Kirk. Get up-to-the-minute coverage, fresh perspectives, and real talk—always free, always fearless. Watch now on STIRR and stay ahead with SNC!

6759.name: DeFiance Media
6759.description: Where tech meets culture. DeFiance Media dishes up nonstop takes on Web3, blockchain, AI, and the wild world of decentralized everything—with news, shows, and smart humans (and bots) at the mic.

6701.description: Al Jazeera delivers bold, global news coverage 24/7. From breaking headlines to deep dives—watch it all free, wherever you are. No hype. Just news.

6414.description: NTD is a New York-based, global television network to bring the world uncensored and truthful information. NTD strives to remain free from external influence—whether from political, financial, or special interests. We have rapidly emerged as a leading independent news broadcaster.

6441.name: My Money
6441.description: “My Money” FAST channel offers free, ad-supported financial content, including market updates, investment tips, and personal finance advice. Available on smart TVs and streaming devices, it provides 24/7 programming with targeted advertising, catering to viewers seeking accessible financial info.

7537.description: EntrepreneurTV is a 24/7 channel from Entrepreneur Media featuring original series, pitch shows, documentaries, and how‑to programs that spotlight founders, side hustles, and business trends to inspire and educate current and aspiring entrepreneurs.

7539.name: Black Enterprise Streaming Network
7539.description: Black Enterprise Streaming Network is a 24/7 FAST channel showcasing interviews, panels, and event content focused on Black entrepreneurship, wealth-building, leadership, and culture, featuring executives, founders, and changemakers from the Black Enterprise community.

7293.name: Screams TV
7293.description: Screams TV delivers nonstop horror—terrifying movies, shocking series, and cult classics that will haunt your dreams. From supernatural chills to slasher thrills, tune in 24/7 for your ultimate scare fix on STIRR.

7295.description: Gritos TV te trae terror sin parar: películas espeluznantes, series impactantes y clásicos de culto que te pondrán los pelos de punta. Disfruta sustos sobrenaturales y emociones fuertes, 24/7 solo en STIRR.

7297.name: Mi Miedo Canal
7297.description: MI MIEDO CANAL is your home for nonstop horror—chilling movies, haunting series, and cult classics that will keep you on edge. From supernatural scares to psychological thrillers, get your daily dose of fear 24/7 on STIRR.

School, DIY, life hacks, pranks, beauty tips, myth-busting, comedy and much,

7303.description: HORIZON SPORTS is your 24/7 channel for outdoor adventure and active living. From trail running to cycling, mountain sports to wellness journeys, catch inspiring stories and nonstop action that fuel your passion for the great outdoors on STIRR.

7277.name: DRIVE+SPEED

7273.name: MMA TV
7273.description: We’re bringing you nonstop MMA action—fights, knockouts, and all the adrenaline you crave. Catch live bouts, classic matchups, and exclusive behind-the-scenes moments. MMA TV is your home for combat sports, 24/7. Let’s get ready to rumble!

5299.description: Your new favorite channel is totally free (and totally awesome). Freebie TV’s got everything—classic shows, binge-worthy series, and hidden gems you’ll actually want to watch. No subscriptions, no tricks, no BS. Just great TV that won’t cost you a thing. Stream smart, spend zero.
